0.text: Answer the following questions. a) When did the friends meet? b) Where did they meet? c) Who are the friends? d) Who came late? e) What did Venura show his friends? f) What is Kaveesha going to do?
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Answer the following questions. a) When did the friends meet? b) Where did they meet? c) Who are the friends? d) Who came late? e) What did <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='venura'>Venura</phoneme> show his friends? f) What is <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='kaviːʃa'>Kaveesha</phoneme> going to do?</prosody></speak>

3.text: Listen and underline the correct answer to complete the sentences. Kaveesha's water magic
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Listen and underline the correct answer to complete the sentences. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='kaviːʃa'>Kaveesha</phoneme>'s water magic</prosody></speak>

4.text: (1) You need........ a) a glass and a piece of cardboard. b) a glass and a piece of paper.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(1) You need........ a) a glass and a piece of cardboard. b) a glass and a piece of paper.</prosody></speak>

5.text: (2) Fill the glass ............. a) with sand. b) with water.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(2) Fill the glass ............. a) with sand. b) with water.</prosody></speak>

6.text: (3) Put the cardboard................... a) over the mouth of the glass. b) into the glass.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(3) Put the cardboard................... a) over the mouth of the glass. b) into the glass.</prosody></speak>

7.text: (4) You should......... a) let air bubbles enter the glass. b) not let air bubbles enter the glass.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(4) You should......... a) let air bubbles enter the glass. b) not let air bubbles enter the glass.</prosody></speak>

8.text: (5)Turn the glass.................. a) to a side. b) upside down.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(5)Turn the glass.................. a) to a side. b) upside down.</prosody></speak>
